title: What is the name of the English music video of a female artist , in which a guy’s family , people around him watch him and his gf with confused look.. but it turns out the girl was a mannequin and only the guy saw her as real? - Quora

response.answer_text: I believe the music video you’re thinking of is the song “Nothing’s Gonna Stop Is Now” by Starship. The song was recorded by the band as a power ballad theme for the 1987 rom com “Mannequin”. The music video features scenes from the movie as well as the two lead vocalists of Starship (Mickey Thomas and Grace Slick) that reference a mannequin coming to life for a male protagonist. The song alone went on to hit number 1 in the Billboard Hot 100. One of my all time favorite 80’s hits!
